name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Dynamic Remote Data Engineer with 9+ years of experience in managing the job cycle (MtJC) and real-time job monitoring. Demonstrated expertise in **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Redis** for efficient data transaction and processing in digital oilfields. Strong analytical problem-solving skills paired with exceptional communication capabilities, enabling effective stakeholder engagement. Highly adaptable multitasker with proficiency in both frontend and backend technologies, including **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, **.NET**, and **C#**. Proven track record of optimizing performance and delivering innovative solutions in complex project environments.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **digital oilfield** techniques to enhance data lifecycle management for improved data accuracy and integrity.
Streamlined **real time job monitoring** processes by designing and implementing monitoring solutions, ensuring a 25% increase in job cycle efficiency.
Utilized **analytical problem-solving** skills to identify and resolve data discrepancies, leading to a reduction in errors by 30%.
Fostered effective **stakeholder engagement** through regular communication updates, resulting in a 40% improvement in project alignment and support.
Executed complex **transmission protocols** to ensure reliable data transfer across distributed systems, achieving a consistent data flow.
Applied **communication skills** to make technical information accessible to non-technical stakeholders, facilitating better decision-making processes.
Demonstrated **multitasking** abilities by managing multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring on-time delivery of all engineering tasks.
Adapted to changing project requirements swiftly, using **adaptability** to refine solutions in a fast-paced environment.
Employed **technical skills** in various frameworks and tools, including .NET 7 and ReactJS, to develop scalable data solutions.
Maintained a focus on operational excellence, achieving a 20% increase in data processing speed through optimized workflows.

• Leveraged **real-time job monitoring** techniques to implement a cloud-based project management tool, improving team collaboration efficiency by **15%**.
• Applied **analytical problem-solving** skills to create a microservices architecture using **RabbitMQ** for task orchestration and **Apache Kafka** for event-driven data streams, enhancing system scalability.
• Utilized **technical skills** by integrating **Redis** as a caching layer, resulting in a **25%** reduction in latency in frequent API calls.
• Developed robust **RESTful APIs** with **.NET Core** integrated with a **PostgreSQL** database for real-time data access.
• Built and maintained components using **ReactJS** and **Tailwind CSS**, leading to a **25%** improvement in user engagement on the platform.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions**, achieving a **30%** reduction in production deployment errors through rigorous **stakeholder engagement** for clear communication.
• Managed data storage and retrieval effectively with **MSSQL** and **MySQL** databases, optimizing query performance through multitasking and adaptability.
• Collaborated with stakeholders to define system requirements and development timelines, ensuring timely project delivery while honing **communication skills**.
• Developed interactive project status tracking and reporting tools using **D3.js**, enhancing visual representation of data.
• Conducted code reviews and provided mentorship to junior developers, fostering a strong development team and elevating overall productivity.

• Applied **analytical problem-solving** skills to manage the job cycle effectively, ensuring real-time job monitoring for optimal performance.
• Engaged with stakeholders to gather requirements and establish communication protocols, enhancing collaboration across teams.
• Demonstrated **adaptability** by seamlessly handling multiple tasks and projects simultaneously, resulting in a 35% improvement in on-time project delivery.
• Leveraged **technical skills** to develop solutions in a **digital oilfield** environment, utilizing effective **transmission protocols** for efficient data processing.
• Initiated and participated in technical discussions to enhance the team's understanding of job cycles and real-time job monitoring, contributing to a 15% reduction in issue resolution time.
• Contributed to system enhancements that streamlined job operations, showcasing strong **communication skills** throughout team interactions.
• Utilized **multitasking** capabilities to balance urgent tasks while maintaining the quality of deliverables, leading to a 30% increase in overall team productivity.
• Collaborated with the engineering team to implement best practices in data handling and job management, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
